The three remaining crew members, myself included, will beam down to effect a rescue.

Being massive is stupid. Definition rules!
I know you all think I'm crazy, but a mass murderer is on the verge of controlling an entire country.
You're very lucky to come in when you did when the mass is still small...
And when people think you're weak, they come in droves to take what's yours.
Someone as muddled as you shouldn't get a dog.

I believe in critical mass, in tipping points.
